name: employed
content:

having a job working for a company or another person: In April the number of employed people in the region dropped by 1,900 to 637,500. Part-time workers accounted for 29.3% of the employed population last year. Her husband is not currently employed.
people with jobs working for a company or another person: The self-employed pay national insurance at a lower rate than the employed.
